notesStmt.note: Incipits enlarged square characters, above a space; A folio from a Hebrew commentary on Ghazzālīs Maqāṣid al-falāsifah (Intentions of the Philosophers), in which paragraphs from Ghazzālī's text, starting with אמר אבוחמד, are interspersed with his comments, starting with אמר המעתיק; Fragment contains the two articles parallel to, in the published edition (Georges Vajda. Sefer Tiḳun ha-deʻot le-Yitsḥaḳ Albalag / hehedir ʻal-pi kitve-yad ṿe-tsiref mavo, marʾe-meḳomot u-mafteḥot, Yehudah Aryeh Ṿaidah. Yerushalayim : ha-Aḳademyah ha-leʾumit ha-Yiśraʾelit la-madaʻim. 733 [1973]) p. 20 l. 21-p. 22 l. 4 (comment nos. 19, 20).
